titleStmt.title: A proclamation of His Majesties grace, favour, and pardon to the inhabitants of his county of Lincolne, and of his citty of Lincolne, and county of the same citty
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: At head of title: By the King.
"Given at our court at Oxford, the twelfth day Ianuary, in the eighteenth yeare of our reigne."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
